Player History
Drafted in 17th round, 195th overall pick, by Minnesota in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off John Elia (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2019, off Carlos Marquez (NYY)...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 5/21/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2019, hitting .524 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2019, hitting .351 with 4 HR, 25 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/8/2019 with a Sprained Ankle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 6/10/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $824,000 per year...
Released by Toronto on 8/9/2021...
